sentences.english: I didn't know who Henry Kissinger was, and I might have asked.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道基辛格是何許人，興許隨口問了。

sentences.english: The original creation is each one all is the wish, but has what kind of person to achieve?
sentences.chinese: 獨創是個個都是想要的，但是有何許人做到？

sentences.english: He knew who Marvin was but never spoke to him.
sentences.chinese: 他知道馬文是何許人，但從來沒跟他說過話。

sentences.english: The Theatre Practice - Who art thou?
He told the captain who I was.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴船長我是何許人。

sentences.english: And full of fear about who I really was.
sentences.chinese: 並且對於我是何許人而充滿了恐懼之情。
丹尼爾的神祕女郎究竟是何許人也？

definition: to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake/to accept an error and adapt to it/to muddle through
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
lit. like thunder piercing the ear/a well-known reputation (idiom)
to comment/a point by point commentary
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
lit. to open the door and see the mountain; fig. to get right to the point (idiom)
lit. chasing the wind and clutching at shadows (idiom); fig. groundless accusations/to act on hearsay evidence
flight of the roc (used in names)/soaring flight
